subject: Career
title: The Burnout-Depression Overlap
description: Learn The Burnout-Depression Overlap in one minute.

hook.text: Is she burned out or depressed? The symptoms overlap. Getting the diagnosis wrong means getting treatment wrong.

buildup.text: Burnout and depression share fatigue, hopelessness, and withdrawal. But they have different roots and treatments.

discovery.text: Burnout is context-specific: change the job and it often resolves. Depression is pervasive across all areas of life.

twist.text: Untreated burnout can evolve into clinical depression. The line between them blurs over time.

climax.text: If burnout symptoms persist outside work â€” in hobbies, relationships, weekends â€” seek professional evaluation.

punchline.text: Burnout is situational. Depression is pervasive. Know the difference.

quiz.question: How does burnout differ from depression?
options: Burnout is context-specific; depression pervades all areas of life
